title: Criterion 1
stimulusHtml:
1 point

Accurately identifies the art-historical period in which the stained glass window was made.
descriptions: Accurately identifies the art-historical period in which the stained glass window was made.

title: Criterion 2
stimulusHtml:
1 point

Accurately explains the content of its iconographical program.
descriptions: Accurately explains the content of its iconographical program.

title: Criterion 3
stimulusHtml:
1 point

Accurately explains the meaning of its iconographical program.
descriptions: Accurately explains the meaning of its iconographical program.

title: Criterion 4
stimulusHtml:
1 point

Accurately analyzes how the window’s iconography references the history of Chartres Cathedral.
descriptions: Accurately analyzes how the window’s iconography references the history of Chartres Cathedral.

title: Criterion 5
stimulusHtml:
1 point

Accurately analyzes how the window’s iconography references changes in the nature of Christian worship during the art-historical period in which the window was made.
descriptions: Accurately analyzes how the window’s iconography references changes in the nature of Christian worship during the art-historical period in which the window was made.
